channel.title: CVE Feed for The SPICE Project -- spice
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The SPICE Project -- spice

item.title: CVE-2017-7506|2024-08-05T16:04:11.818Z -- the%20spice%20project -- spice
item.description: spice versions though 0.13 are vulnerable to out-of-bounds memory access when processing specially crafted messages from authenticated attacker to the spice server resulting into crash and/or server memory leak.
